attributes.action: Cancel tuition fees for university students 19/20 and 20/21 years of education
attributes.background: Cancel tuition fees for university students as covid has had a massive impact on the quality of our teaching. Without access to materials and supplies we need, the work students have to produce is not reflective of our ability and therefore our grades are evidently lower than we deserve.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
